LanguageData.RT_MATV_Vehicle.label: Oshkosh M-ATV
LanguageData.RT_MATV_Vehicle.description:
A mine-resistant ambush protected vehicle designed for war-zone transport, with different arms.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passengerx3
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
